data.name: Pamali: Indonesian Folklore Horror - The Tied Corpse
data.detailed_description:
Access to this DLC will be granted upon release (Q1 2019).

Be Cecep and take care of a cemetery as a gravekeeper. See how one small, seemingly insignificant mistake affects your entire night.

One day, Cecep is suddenly given a responsibility to take part in a burial process. During the burying, one decision made by him turns the whole night down. The night turns dreadful, in which Cecep hears desperate wallowings and calls of help in the graveyard. He realizes that he made a mistake and is faced with choices to save his life or undo his mistakes.

Experience the vast setting of authentic Indonesian cemetery while finding a way to undo your mistakes. Take a taste of Cecep’s life as he realizes that The Tied Corpse follows him throughout the night.

Features:

  • Atmospheric horror in the vast setting of authentic Indonesian cemetery.
  • Immersive Indonesian grave-keeping simulation.
  • Multiple endings depending on the choices player made during the playthrough.
  • Unique Indonesian culture and pamali regarding life and death.

data.short_description: Taste Cecep’s night as a gravekeeper and see how one small, seemingly insignificant mistake affects your entire night while explore the vast setting of authentic Indonesian cemetery.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7200U CPU @ 2.50Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX
  • Processor: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Content is generally suitable for ages 17 and up. May contain intense violence, blood and gore, sexual content and/or strong language.

•    Animated Blood - Discolored and/or unrealistic depictions of blood
•    Blood - Depictions of blood
•    Crude Humor - Depictions or dialogue involving vulgar antics, including "bathroom" humor
•    Fantasy Violence - Violent actions of a fantasy nature, involving human or non-human characters in situations easily distinguishable from real life
•    Intense Violence - Graphic and realistic-looking depictions of physical conflict. May involve extreme and/or realistic blood, gore, weapons and depictions of human injury and death
•    Language - Mild to moderate use of profanity
•    Strong Language - Explicit and/or frequent use of profanity
•    Tobacco Reference - Reference to and/or images of tobacco products
•    Drug Use - References to the use of medication drugs.
